chunks.zh: 下班后，好像最想做的就是打 lol，其他事情也想做，但是一打游戏就停不下来，应该如何改变？
chunks.en: After work, it seems like the first thing I want to do is play LOL. I also want to do other things, but I can't stop once I start playing games. How should I change?

chunks.zh: 看起来你已经养成了某种习惯。
chunks.en: It seems you’ve developed a certain habit.

chunks.zh: 要打破你不希望保留的习惯，可以尝试改变你的环境。
chunks.en: To break habits you don't want to keep, you can try changing your environment.

chunks.zh: 今天下班时，请留意一下自己那些所谓的“半自动行为”，即日常生活中的习惯性动作。
chunks.en: When you get off work today, pay attention to those so-called "semi-automatic behaviors", that is, habitual actions in daily life.

chunks.zh: 例如，你可能习惯于下班后直接回家、点外卖、给手机充电、打开电脑，然后机械地浏览某个固定网站，最后开启 LOL 游戏。
chunks.en: For example, you might be used to going straight home after work, ordering takeout, charging your phone, turning on your computer, and then mechanically browsing a certain website, and finally starting the LOL game.

chunks.zh: 要知道，如果中断了这个流程中的任何一个环节，都有可能延缓甚至阻止你启动 LOL 游戏。
chunks.en: You should know that if you interrupt any part of this process, it may delay or even prevent you from starting the LOL game.

chunks.zh: @junkk 我现在改成输一把就睡觉，发现 15 分钟就能睡了
chunks.en: @junkk I've changed to sleeping after losing one game, and found I can fall asleep within 15 minutes

chunks.zh: 建议珍惜自己打游戏还有热情的时间
chunks.en: It is recommended to cherish the time when you are still passionate about playing the game

chunks.zh: 先来两发
chunks.en: Just two rounds first

chunks.zh: 羡慕可以一直撸啊撸的, 我撸一发之后都觉得累
chunks.en: I envy those who can keep playing, I feel tired after a single game

chunks.zh: 强迫自己消费一些高质量的内容，以此来冲击一直以来玩 LOL 的习惯。
chunks.en: Force yourself to consume some high-quality content to counteract the habit of playing LOL.

chunks.zh: 比如，看一些名著，最好是思考深度比较强 的那种，看一些好电影，能让你安静下来的，比如《步履不停》。
chunks.en: For example, read some classic books, preferably those with deep philosophical thought, and watch some good movies that can calm you down, such as "Still Walking".

chunks.zh: 一开始可能难以投入，但是需要强迫自己坚持，如果能发现这些内容与 LOL 之间的强烈对比，你就会逐渐发现 LOL 是真的没意思。
chunks.en: It may be difficult to get into it at first, but you need to force yourself to persevere. If you can find a strong contrast between these contents and LOL, you will gradually find that LOL is really boring.

chunks.zh: 玩什么 LOL ，玩点单机不好么 ，通关就结束，质量也可以自己挑选。
chunks.en: Why play LOL? Isn't it better to play some single-player games, which end when you complete the game, and you can also choose the quality yourself?

chunks.zh: Dota2!
chunks.en: Dota2!

chunks.zh: @shyling #7  最后赢一把就睡觉，然后连跪 8 把 /doge
chunks.en: @shyling #7 Sleep after winning the last game, then lose 8 in a row /doge

chunks.zh: 珍惜还能打游戏的时间
chunks.en: Cherish the time you can still play games

chunks.zh: 首先，每个人都会有自己的嗜好，这很正常，你要明确你改变它的目的是什么？
chunks.en: First of all, everyone has their own hobbies, which is normal. You need to clarify your purpose for changing it?

chunks.zh: 你要只是觉得这样的习惯不好，那其实你改掉这个习惯后也是一样迷茫的状态，并没有什么意义。
chunks.en: If you just think this habit is not good, then you will still be in a confused state after changing this habit, and it is meaningless.

chunks.zh: 如果你有明确目的性的话，改这种习惯其实真不算什么难事。
chunks.en: If you have a clear purpose, it's not really difficult to change this kind of habit.

chunks.zh: @Aoonthetop 我的解决方式是直接把 Lol 卸载了
chunks.en: @Aoonthetop My solution is to uninstall Lol directly

chunks.zh: @poorAshenOne 最后亿把，赢了就睡觉！
chunks.en: @poorAshenOne The very last one, sleep after winning!

chunks.zh: 玩一玩愉悦一下挺好的，lol 也就半小时到一小时一局。
chunks.en: It's great to play for fun, one game of lol takes only half an hour to an hour.

chunks.zh: 我刚工作的时候下班就开始打 wow 一直到凌晨，下个副本怎么也得 3 ，4 小时起。
chunks.en: When I just started working, I would play wow after work until the early morning, and it would take at least 3 to 4 hours to beat a dungeon.

chunks.zh: lol 又不用花钱，多好。
chunks.en: LOL doesn't cost any money, how great.

chunks.zh: 等有小孩了自然就改了，没啥一起玩的朋友，也没时间了。
chunks.en: You'll naturally change when you have kids. You won't have any friends to play with, and you won't have time.

chunks.zh: 那就先做其他事，最后再开一把
chunks.en: Then do other things first, and finally play one more game

chunks.zh: 不是说 Follow your heart 嘛想干嘛就干嘛呗
chunks.en: Isn't it said Follow your heart, do whatever you want

chunks.zh: 曾经打 lol 经常超时(大乱斗上瘾单机玩家，超过 12 点), 后来都玩 switch(塞尔达，马利奥系列), 解决娱乐需求(不再想打 lol)的同时玩游戏时长压缩到日均 1 到 2 小时左右, 多出来的时间陪陪家人以及看看书, 目前状态良好。
chunks.en: I used to play LOL and often stayed up too late (addicted to the URF mode and a single-player gamer, past 12 o'clock). Later, I played Switch (Zelda, Mario series), which solved the entertainment needs (no longer wanting to play LOL) and reduced the game time to about 1 to 2 hours per day. I spent the extra time with my family and read books, and my current state is good.

chunks.zh: 总结就是换一些不容易上瘾的游戏（以及现在年龄大了）。
chunks.en: The summary is to switch to some games that are not easily addictive (and because I am older now).

chunks.zh: LOL 不开黑我碰都不想碰，我不打游戏 但还是什么事情都不想干
chunks.en: I don't want to touch LOL unless I'm playing with friends. I don't play games, but I still don't want to do anything

chunks.zh: 一群人撸的话，建议降低频率
chunks.en: If you are playing with a group of people, it is recommended to reduce the frequency

chunks.zh: 能玩的下去就可以了。
chunks.en: It's fine as long as you can play.

chunks.zh: 像我这 回家都懒得开电脑
chunks.en: Like me, I'm too lazy to turn on the computer when I get home

chunks.zh: 出去面试，增加焦虑感就不想玩了
chunks.en: Go out for an interview, and the increased anxiety makes me not want to play
